is that Gran turismo for  PC ?

No.  Sega GT was Sega's try at a similar type of game.  The sequel was on XBox.

Will say I'm slightly confused by the description here - one image to install, another to play?
pata pata pata pong oh yeah come get some.
Wainting patiently... damn slow download rate, but this game worth it...

Thanks for the upload, good speed, but I can't get it working, I wasn't expecting it to work 100% because of it's age. But, I installed it on Windows 7 32bit, and it loads the sega logo, then plays the activision bit, but only audio, the screen is black, then nothing, If I press alt+f4 it shows a dialoguebox saying "are you sure  you want to quit" or something like that. I was wondering if someone could help me? If someone can, and would like to, could you please email me @ evillord@live.com.au thanks.
